participant_1.background:
My mother's bedtime stories helped to develop my love of reading.
I keep my home so clean that it's almost a museum.
I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young.
I make enough money to be able to enjoy my hobbies, like music.
I fear that my writing will never be good enough.

i like eating healthy foods.
I like to visit music websites to keep up with new releases and find new artists to listen to.

content.text: I'm a big fan of music, especially indie bands. How about you?
I like to check out new artists on music websites.
I like finding underground artists that not many people have heard of.
I like to do that too. It's more exciting to find new music that no one knows about.
I agree. I love discovering new artists and sharing them with my friends.
I love sharing music with people too. It's a great way to connect with others and find new music.
I agree. Music is a great way to connect with people.
I'm glad we have something in common. What are some of your favorite music websites?
I like bandcamp and soundcloud. They're great for finding new music.
I've never used soundcloud. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great platform for independent musicians.
I'm always looking for new music to listen to
